name: Shadow's Light
description:
Delve into the bunker in this horror stealth adventure. Try not to die.

To make it out alive you must find the keys.

All assets (except for the font) were made within the span of 3 days for the DevAtlas2 game jam.

Latest patch is recommended for a number of quality of life fixes, collision fixes, texture fixes, audio mixer fixes and a Easter egg on the last level for those brave enough to face their fears.

CREDITS:

Game Design, Level Design, Character, Prop  - Gatlin Fitzgerald
